Name: Abecean Longfin
Description: Collected by catching Abacean Longfish.

Name: Ancestor Moth Wing
Description: Collected by catching Ancestor Moths.

Name: Bear Claws
Description: Collected from various types of dead Bears.

Name: Bee
Description: Collected from beehives and by catching Bees.

Name: Beehive Husk
Description: Collected from beehives.

Name: Bleeding Crown
Description: Harvested from Bleeding Crown, a mushroom found in various caves.

Name: Blisterwort
Description: Harvested from Blisterwort mushrooms found in various caves.

Name: Blue Butterfly Wing
Description: Collected by catching Blue Butterflies. Often found during daylight hours near flowering plants.

Name: Blue Dartwing
Description: Collected by catching Dragonflies found near rivers and streams below the snow line.

Name: Blue Mountain Flower
Description: Harvested from the blue variety of Mountain Flower, found throughout Skyrim.

Name: Bone Meal
Description: Collected from undead such as skeletons, and Draugr.

Name: Briar Heart
Description: Collected from Forsworn Briarhearts.

Name: Butterfly Wing
Description: Collected from catching Monarch Butterflies. Often found during daylight hours near flowering plants.

Name: Canis Root
Description: Harvested from Canis Root, found in The Rift and Hjaalmarch

Name: Charred Skeever Hide
Description: Food, collected from dead Skeevers found on roasting spits.

Name: Chaurus Eggs
Description: Collected from Chaurus Egg Sacs, found in Falmer caves.

Name: Chaurus Hunter Antennae
Description: Collected from dead Chaurus Hunters and Chaurus Hunter Fledglings.

Name: Chicken's Egg
Description: Food, harvested from Chicken nests in various farms.

Name: Creep Cluster
Description: Harvested from Creep Cluster, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch.

Name: Crimson Nirnroot
Description: Harvested from Crimson Nirnroot, found in Blackreach, needed for the quest A Return To Your Roots.

Name: Cyrodilic Spadetail
Description: Collected by catching Cyrodilic Spadetail fish.

Name: Daedra Heart
Description: Collected from dead Dremora.

Name: Deathbell
Description: Harvested from Deathbell, found in Hjaalmarch.

Name: Dragon's Tongue
Description: Harvested from Dragon's Tongue, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch.

Name: Dwarven Oil
Description: Collected from destroyed Dwarven Automatons, found in Dwarven Ruins.

Name: Ectoplasm
Description: Collected from undead Ghosts.

Name: Elves Ear
Description: Harvested from Dried Elves Ear bunches found in homes and camps.

Name: Eye of Sabre Cat
Description: Collected from dead Sabre Cats.

Name: Falmer Ear
Description: Collected from dead Falmer.

Name: Fire Salts
Description: Collected from dead Flame Atronachs, a type of daedra.

Name: Fly Amanita
Description: Collected from Fly Amanita mushrooms, found in various caves.

Name: Frost Mirriam
Description: Harvested from Dried Frost Mirriam bunches found in homes and camps.

Name: Frost Salts
Description: Collected from dead Frost Atronachs, a type of daedra.

Name: Garlic
Description: Food. Can also be harvested from Garlic Braids.

Name: Giant Lichen
Description: Harvested from Giant Lichen, found in Hjaalmarch.

Name: Giant's Toe
Description: Collected from dead Giants, which can be found in Giant Camps.

Name: Gleamblossom
Description: Harvested from the plant of the same name.

Name: Glow Dust
Description: Collected from dead Wisps and Wispmothers.

Name: Glowing Mushroom
Description: Harvested from Glowing Mushrooms, found in various caves.

Name: Grass Pod
Description: Harvested from Spiky Grass, found in northern regions of Skyrim.

Name: Hagraven Claw
Description: Collected from dead Hagravens.

Name: Hagraven Feathers
Description: Collected from dead Hagravens. Can also be found scattered around their sleeping areas.

Name: Hanging Moss
Description: Harvested from Hanging Moss.

Name: Hawk Beak
Description: Collected from dead Hawks.

Name: Hawk Feathers
Description: Collected from dead Hawks.

Name: Hawk's Egg
Description: Collected from Hawk nests.

Name: Histcarp
Description: Collected by catching Histcarp fish.

Name: Honeycomb
Description: Food. Collected from beehives.

Name: Human Flesh
Description: Cannot be harvested or collected; with the Dawnguard plug-in installed, several respawning samples can be found in Volkihar Keep.

Name: Human Heart
Description: Cannot be harvested or collected; limited number of samples available.

Name: Ice Wraith Teeth
Description: Collected from dead Ice Wraiths.

Name: Imp Stool
Description: Harvested from Imp Stool mushrooms, found in various caves.

Name: Jazbay Grapes
Description: Harvested from Jazbay vines, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch.

Name: Juniper Berries
Description: Harvested from Juniper shrubs, common in The Reach.

Name: Large Antlers
Description: Collected from dead male Elk.

Name: Lavender
Description: Harvested from Lavender, most common in Whiterun Hold.

Name: Luna Moth Wing
Description: Collected by catching Luna Moths. Often found near flowers after dark.

Name: Moon Sugar
Description: Cannot be collected or harvested. Can be purchased from the Khajiit Traders.

Name: Mora Tapinella
Description: Harvested from Mora Tapinella mushrooms, found growing on dead trees.

Name: Mudcrab Chitin
Description: Collected from dead Mudcrabs, found in or near bodies of water.

Name: Namira's Rot
Description: Harvested from Namira's Rot mushrooms, found in various caves.

Name: Nightshade
Description: Harvested from Nightshade, found growing throughout Skyrim.

Name: Nirnroot
Description: Harvested from Nirnroot, found near bodies of water throughout Skyrim.

Name: Nordic Barnacle
Description: Harvested from Nordic Barnacle Clusters, found in or near water.

Name: Orange Dartwing
Description: Collected by catching Dragonflies found near rivers and streams below the snow line.

Name: Pearl
Description: Cannot be harvested or collected in the original version of the game; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked. With Dragonborn, they can be harvested from Pearl Oysters in Solstheim.

Name: Pine Thrush Egg
Description: Harvested from bird nests in forested regions, particularly The Rift.

Name: Poison Bloom
Description: Harvested from the plant of the same name.

Name: Powdered Mammoth Tusk
Description: Cannot be harvested or collected; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked.

Name: Purple Mountain Flower
Description: Harvested from the purple variety of Mountain Flower.

Name: Red Mountain Flower
Description: Harvested from the red variety of Mountain Flower.

Name: River Betty
Description: Collected by catching River Betty fish.

Name: Rock Warbler Egg
Description: Harvested from bird nests in rocky regions, in particular The Reach.

Name: Sabre Cat Tooth
Description: Collected from dead Sabre cats.

Name: Salmon Roe
Description: Harvested from jumping Salmon.

Name: Salt Pile
Description: Food. Cannot be harvested or collected, but is commonly found in barrels and sacks.

Name: Scaly Pholiota
Description: Harvested from Scaly Pholiota mushrooms, found growing on dead trees.

Name: Silverside Perch
Description: Collected by catching Silverside Perch fish.

Name: Skeever Tail
Description: Collected from dead Skeevers.

Name: Slaughterfish Egg
Description: Collected from Slaughterfish Egg Nests, found in or near water.

Name: Slaughterfish Scales
Description: Collected from dead Slaughterfish.

Name: Small Antlers
Description: Collected from dead female Elk.

Name: Small Pearl
Description: Cannot be harvested or collected in the original version of the game; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked. With Dragonborn, they can be harvested from Pearl Oysters in Solstheim.

Name: Snowberries
Description: Harvested from Snowberry bushes, found in snowy regions of Skyrim.

Name: Spider Egg
Description: Collected from spider Egg Sacs and Web Sacs.

Name: Spriggan Sap
Description: Cannot be harvested or collected; best source is merchants.

Name: Swamp Fungal Pod
Description: Harvested from Swamp Fungal Pod, common in the tundra marsh of Hjaalmarch.

Name: Taproot
Description: Collected from dead Spriggans.

Name: Thistle Branch
Description: Harvested from Thistle.

Name: Torchbug Thorax
Description: Collected by catching Torchbugs. Found below the snowline after dark.

Name: Troll Fat
Description: Collected from dead Trolls.

Name: Tundra Cotton
Description: Harvested from Tundra Cotton, found in Whiterun Hold.

Name: Vampire Dust
Description: Collected from dead Vampires.

Name: Void Salts
Description: Collected from dead Storm Atronachs.

Name: Wheat
Description: Food. Harvested from wheat bushels, found in various farms.

Name: White Cap
Description: Harvested from White Cap mushrooms, found in various caves.

Name: Wisp Wrappings
Description: Collected from dead Wispmothers.

Name: Yellow Mountain Flower
Description: Harvested from the yellow variety of Mountain Flower.
